explains: adj. 神秘的；离奇的；可怕的

sentences.en: She bears an uncanny resemblance to Dido.
sentences.cn: 她跟迪多长得离奇的相似。

sentences.en: I had an uncanny feeling I was being watched.
sentences.cn: 我有种被人监视的奇怪感觉。

sentences.en: Tony was unnerved by the uncanny familiarity of her face.
sentences.cn: 托尼被她不寻常的熟悉面孔弄得心烦意乱。
